text: The best dietitian I could have hoped for

A practical, experienced doctor who realistically approaches the patient's limitations and goal-setting, provides detailed instructions, and conveys information in an accessible manner; the first consultation encourages further action :-).

I highly recommend Dr. Jan! Two months ago, I started at 113 kg, and today I'm at 91. That speaks for itself. The doctor is very thorough and inquisitive during the interview. He explained in detail what processes occur when consuming specific meals. He gave precise guidelines on what I can eat and what to absolutely avoid. He managed my insulin resistance and celiac disease very well through diet. I feel much better following the doctor's recommendations and have finally started losing weight.

After the first meeting, I am very pleasantly surprised. I have never encountered such an engaged specialist before; I received answers and explanations to every question I asked. Jan dedicated a lot of time to me and was full of understanding for my problem. I look forward to developing our collaboration!
It was my first meeting, but I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone who wants to improve their health and feel better. I can't wait to get the diet and start taking action.
I am very satisfied with the visit. The doctor explained everything in detail, and the very relaxed atmosphere made me feel like I was talking to a good friend. I highly recommend Dr. Jan.
Professional approach to the patient, combined with a simple and understandable presentation of medical issues.
I recommend - full engagement, professionalism, and a friendly atmosphere. And the kilograms are dropping.
It was very good, now I'm optimistically waiting for the results.
A very nice lady, I hope the diet will be effective.
A very pleasant visit. Anna is engaged, attentive, and professional.

Generally, I was satisfied with the visits, but punctuality is lacking - I had to remind them every time to send the diet updates. Additionally, after the last visit in March (I paid for the visit the next day), I did not receive an updated diet. I wrote a message to Anna, but the only response I received was that our last contact was in January. I later sent a message stating that we had a visit in March and a photo of the transfer, but there was no response. It's a shame because I think she is a good dietitian, but due to the lack of punctuality, collaboration is very difficult.
I recommend. Professionally. Everything was discussed concretely and precisely.
I highly recommend the dietitian - thorough analysis, empathy, clear explanation of everything.
An extremely concrete dietary consultation; it certainly won't end with just one meeting :).

This was my first visit to the dietitian. She explained everything to me in detail, directed me toward specific actions, and thoroughly discussed my body composition analysis results with me. The Master is a very pleasant person; the visit takes place in a very nice, almost homely atmosphere. I wholeheartedly recommend Anna!
The dietitian explains everything matter-of-factly and illustrates the diet plan. It's the first visit, but the doctor seems highly engaged and eager to help.
Very good dietitian :)
I recommend; the visit went satisfactorily, I feel fully cared for and informed.

There is a multitude of information and self-proclaimed dietitians regarding nutrition diets, but it's easy to go astray. Here, we have the solution to our problem. Anna is properly educated, and her knowledge defends itself in what she does with passion. She helps the sick. She is not afraid of difficult cases. I am a living example where her help, specifically the meal plan, brought my blood count to an ideal state in 2 months, even though I was after chemotherapy. I am grateful even though I didn't believe. I recommend Anna's advice to everyone - they work wonders.
